mapper.sql: id, mtmy_user_id AS mtmyUserId, price, type, status, channel_flag AS channelFlag, source_flag AS sourceFlag, remarks, create_office_id AS createOfficeId, create_by AS createBy, create_date AS createDate
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mtmydb.mtmy_user_accounts_log( mtmy_user_id, price, type, status, channel_flag, source_flag, remarks, create_office_id, create_by, create_date )values( #{mtmyUserId}, #{price}, #{type}, #{status}, #{channelFlag}, #{sourceFlag}, #{remarks}, #{createOfficeId}, #{createBy.id}, SYSDATE() )
